title: why doesn't lissandras ult function like Bards?
body:

replies.body: Classic bronze thread. Learn to counterplay.

Yasuo isn't even a thing anymore, he was nerfed ages ago. Also while in your head it looks like a good idea, it wont fit freelosandras kit at all, and it'd just be ripping bards ability.. lol.

Her ult should be a DoT, the longer you're in it the more damage you receive.

yasuo is shit but he is cancer to lane against as most champions, brb 0.1s gapcloser to dodge skillshots plus windwall if you somehow have korean challenger prediction ability and can hit a constantly gapclosing target, and even if you manage to hit him he has a huge passive shield that absorbs at least 1 spell and recharges in seconds, you run out of mana on most champs before you can kill him, if you try to roam he instapushes the wave with 0s CD abilities and takes tower because he builds AD, then loses the game for his team because you cant charge knockup relibably outside of lane rendering his ult useless unless you have a teammate with an aoe knockup
